properties.alert.recommendation: ${alert_level:equals('low'):ifElse('Consider consuming 15g fast-acting carbs','Consider insulin correction as per care plan')}

properties.Subject: CGM Warning: ${alert_level} glucose level

properties.Message:
Patient ${patient_id} has persistent ${alert_level} glucose levels.
Current reading: ${glucose_level} mg/dL
Trend: ${glucose_trend}
Please follow up with patient.
properties.Subject: Follow-up: Patient ${patient_id} with persistent ${alert_level} glucose
ESCALATED: Critical CGM Alert - No Response
CRITICAL CGM ALERT: Patient ${patient_id} - ${alert_level}
